sentences.en: Horizon Blue, Corn Yellow and Pistachio Green are just three of the vibrant colours in this range.
sentences.cn: 天际蓝、玉米黄、淡草绿色只是这一色系内的3种亮色。

sentences.en: Oil, Tomato Khup , Saffron , Sugar, Alcohol, Pistachio , Fish Ton Saffrons.
sentences.cn: 采购产品涂油水, 蕃茄, 番红花, 糖, 酒精.

sentences.en: Pistachio custard with coffee syrup; Berries and cream; and little almond cakes.
sentences.cn: 开心果奶油与咖啡糖浆, 红豆,奶油和小杏仁饼.

sentences.en: Sugar, Milk Fat, Bengal Gram Flour, Wheat Flour, Cardamom, Pistachio, Almond.
sentences.cn: 糖, 乳脂 、 孟加拉克面粉 、 小麦粉 、 豆蔻 、 开心果 、 杏仁.

sentences.en: T & G Pistachio Paste is made of natural pistachio. For 1 L ice mix 60 ~100 g Pistachio Paste.
sentences.cn: 开心果酱由100%天然开心果制作而成. 用量为每升冰淇淋混料加入开心果酱60~100克.

sentences.en: The art pieces - look - like desserts sweet tooth, the usual ingredients would be the pistachio and the hazelnuts.
sentences.cn: 精致娇小的甜品,赏心悦目,甜品中常用的原料有开心果以及榛果等,甜度比一般的口味高.

sentences.en: The spots intact and pistachio walls in one building, with tourism and appreciation of the value.
sentences.cn: 该景点完整无损,并于墙内建筑浑于一体, 具有旅游和鉴赏价值.

trans.tran_cn: 阿月浑子树，阿月浑子果实，淡黄绿色
